subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: DETROIT, April 28 (AP) — Pavel Datsyuk and Henrik Zetterberg answered the call Saturday for the Detroit Red Wings’ top players to be at their best.
snippet: DETROIT, April 28 (AP) — Pavel Datsyuk and Henrik Zetterberg answered the call Saturday for the Detroit Red Wings’ top players to be at their best.
